channel.title: references on Let's see what happens.
channel.description: Recent content in references on Let's see what happens.

item.title: Matter of Life and Death
item.description: Hypnotic start and common but strange finish. Sometimes things not said or not shown are interesting. Here I see ideas about thunderbolt, neuron growth, ladder, and “flight from Berlin”. Also script should have some ideas that did not make it into the movie. There is propaganda angle to it which is fine by me. I think it is still strong even if the idea of Anglo-American cooperation in the new world is ignored.
